name: DJ Hamstarz: Aspiring Mix-Lord
description:
Remix the music with your weapons as you blast your way through this musical level!

"A flying hamster DJ trying to make it big faces an army of robots, sent by the evil DJ Gerbillionaire, who only believes in crushing rodent remix dreams." - Kieran

Made in one weekend for PegJam 2017.

Controls:

Arrow keys to move; spacebar to switch instruments/weapons
OR gamepad joystick to move; 'A' to switch instruments/weapons

Credits:

Enemy Design, Modeling and Animation, Punster Supreme: Dustin Bogers
Main Character Design, Modeling, and Animation, Particles: Aleksey S.Musician, Sound Designer, Hamster Wrangler: Justin Koop
Additional Sound Support, Invisible Phantom Presence: Kris Isaak
Level Design, Game Tester, He Who Sleeps Beyond the Stars: Ben Bergman
Programmer, Project Lead, Potentially a Lobster In Disguise: Matt Woelk

Audio engine : FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies
